name: American City Sniper Shooter
description:
In killing games, you are given stealth mission as a military sniper shooter you must be quick to complete each mission. This modern sniper shooter game consists of thrilling objective in which you have to take down the boss. Being a good American fps soldier, you have to fight with mafia gangsters.

Explore 3D environment to find your target and aim with the scope of your sniper. Take a shot on the correct spot as asked in mission objective.

If you are looking for new games and free offline games then adventure awaits you in arena of battle.

Features
- Stunning 3D Environment
- Multiple sniping location and offline mission types
- Realistic bullet time effect and slow motion
- Hi-res graphics and environment
- Immersive sound effects
- Don’t waste time and install now for free and play offline.
